thread.title: BRIEF-Skyworth Digital Clarifies Press Article Stating Co Targets To Increase Profit By Two Fold In Fy2018

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Skyworth Digital Clarifies Press Article Stating Co Targets To Increase Profit By Two Fold In Fy2018
text:
March 5 (Reuters) - Skyworth Digital Holdings Ltd:
* NOTES PRESS ARTICLE WHICH SAYS CO TARGETS TO INCREASE ITS NEW INCOME BY 20% AND PROFIT BY TWO FOLD IN 2018 FINANCIAL YEAR​
* APPLIED TO STOCK EXCHANGE FOR RESUMPTION OF TRADING IN CO’S ORDINARY SHARES AT 1:00 P.M. ON MARCH 5
* SKCLARIFIES THAT FIGURES IN PRESS ATRICLE ARE FOR INTERNAL DISCUSSION & DO NOT INDICATE THAT CO CAN OR WILL ACHIEVE THESE RESULTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
